name: HomeMiner
0:
”Alexa, turn on home miner”
”Alexa, turn off home miner”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Allows users to turn on and off the smart Home Miner hardware and software to stop mining or return to normal operations.
